column4: na hom Israel fi hom nkyɛn aso
column7: na hom do na atsɛmbu no aba; na hom ayɛ efir wɔ Mizpa
column8: na eboa a wɔatserɛw mu wɔ Tabor etsifi."

column2: "Na etuatsewfo no enya ewu ndzii; na emi na meka hɔn nyina hɔn enyim."

column3: na Israel so nnsuma me: na afei

column2: "Hɔn ndzeyɛɛ remma wɔnnsan mmba hɔn Nyankopɔn nkyɛn: na ndwamanyɛ sunsum wɔ hɔn mu
"Na Israel ahopɔw dzi n'enyim dase dɛm ntsi Israel na Efraim befintsiw wɔ hɔn emumuyɛ mu: Juda so nye hɔn befintsiw."
"Wɔdze hɔn nguan na hɔn anantwi bɔkɔ akɔhwehwɛ EWURADZE: na worunnhu no osiandɛ ɔatwe noho efi hɔn nkyɛn."
"Woetwa EWURADZE nkontompɔ; na wɔawowo anana mba: afei bosoom fofor bɛmen hɔn nye hɔn kyɛfa."
"Hom mbɔ abɛn no mu wɔ Gibea
column3: na akasamu no mu wɔ Rama: hom mbɔ ehuu wɔ Bɛt-aven; Benjamin e

column2: "Efraim bɛyɛ amamfo wɔ nkaenyim da no mu: dza ɔbɛba ara ampa na mama woehu wɔ Israel mbusuakuw mu no."
"Juda asafohen ayɛ dɛ hɔn a wɔtwe ɔhe pin ekyir: mubohue m'ebufuw egu hɔn do dɛ nsu."

column3: wɔadwerew no atsɛmbu mu; osiandɛ no bo dwee dɛ obedzi egyangyandze ekyir."

column2: "Dɛm ntsi na mayɛ dɛ awebowa ama Efraim
column3: na dɛ nhuhunii ama Juda fi."

column4: nna Efraim sii mu kɔr Asiria
column5: na ɔsomae kɔr ɔhen Jareb nkyɛn: naaso orunntum nnsa wo yarba
column6: eso ɔremma wo pirakur no nnsa."

column4: na dɛ gyatafɔr ama Juda fi. Emi
column6: na mebɛtsetsew mu na makɔ; mebɛfa akɔ
column7: na obi nnyi hɔ a ɔbɛgye nkwa."

column4: na wɔbɔhwehwɛ m'enyim: hɔn ahohia mu na wɔbɔhwehwɛ me enyiberdo."
